Name: SuperWurfels
About the game: Ever feel like just challenging up to 3 of your friends to one or more matches of some action packed reflex game playable on one keyboard? Then SuperWurfels is the game you are looking for! Destroy dice after dice and create massive combos to defeat your competitors. Features: - Achieve Highscores in Singleplayer games (reach combinations for extra points). - Defeat different bots (4 included as of today) on various difficulty settings (3 settings each). - Play with up to three friends in local games on one keyboard or other controllers.
